verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-LOC: on Twitter] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday afternoon] [ARG1: that he would instruct the Justice Department to look into whether the FBI planted an informant in his presidential campaign for political purposes] .

President Donald Trump said on Twitter on Sunday afternoon that he [V: would] instruct the Justice Department to look into whether the FBI planted an informant in his presidential campaign for political purposes .

President Donald Trump said on Twitter on Sunday afternoon that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: instruct] [ARG1: the Justice Department] [ARG2: to look into whether the FBI planted an informant in his presidential campaign for political purposes] .

President Donald Trump said on Twitter on Sunday afternoon that he would instruct [ARG0: the Justice Department] to [V: look] [ARG1: into whether the FBI planted an informant in his presidential campaign for political purposes] .

President Donald Trump said on Twitter on Sunday afternoon that he would instruct the Justice Department to look into whether [ARG0: the FBI] [V: planted] [ARG1: an informant] [ARG2: in his presidential campaign] [ARGM-PRP: for political purposes] .
